name: The Literal Lord Of The Flies
name_original: The Literal Lord Of The Flies
description:
The Literal Lord of the Flies is a 2D Arena Shot 'em up game with a Pixelized art style made by a team of three (enriquesanchez, kaledryl and jafarj) in one month as a university project. 

Inspired by some of the best games in the RogueLike genre it´s an action-packed game with massive bullet hell scenes to get you on the edge of your seat. 

Featuring Story Mode to get you to experience our hero´s backstory and motives behind his actions and a Horde Mode if you just want a challenge. What´s your highest score?

Thank you for testing our game. We hope you like it!
